name: Calculus I
description: This course covers differential calculus, including limits, continuity, derivatives, and their applications.

name: Calculus II
description: This course covers integral calculus, including techniques of integration, applications of integration, sequences and series, and power series.

name: Discrete Mathematics
description: This course covers various topics in discrete mathematics, including sets, functions, relations, combinatorics, graph theory, and number theory.

name: Linear Algebra
description: This course covers the algebra of linear equations, matrices, determinants, vector spaces, linear transformations, and eigenvectors and eigenvalues.

name: Number Theory
description: This course covers the properties of integers, including divisibility, primes, congruences, Diophantine equations, and quadratic residues.

name: Abstract Algebra
description: This course covers the basic algebraic structures, including groups, rings, and fields, as well as some more advanced topics.

name: Algebraic Number Theory
description: This course covers the theory of algebraic number fields, including the rings of integers in these fields, the ideal theory of these rings, and the arithmetic of algebraic number fields.

name: Analytic Number Theory
description: This course covers the application of analytic methods to problems in number theory, including the prime number theorem, the Riemann zeta function, and Dirichlet L-functions.
